App.Title: Lahyra
App.Description: Lahyra is the place where you can know how much your friends really know you. Every day you can do several challenges and win points. The more you win, the more you can climb the ranking and win rewards!

Footer.Description: By RENAULT Kylian - All rights reserved

Login.Title: Welcome back to Lahyra !
Login.PasswordRule: password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one number, one uppercase and one lowercase letter, and one special character
